attributes.action: Remove public funding for any religious organisation and tax religions as we would any other business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to another petition posted on this site asking that water bill taxation be levied on churches as charities rather than businesses. Religion is a business and deserves no special place in society. In particular it should not be publicly funded in any way whatsoever, which includes funding for faith schools.
